messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: ebay snipe
messages.msgSnippet: Rich, Looks like iron to me (?).  Agree with Kyo-Shoami. Jim ... Matt - The style looks Kyo-Shoami, but I don t know if they did this type of work in soft
messages.messageBody:
Rich,
Looks like iron to me (?). Agree with Kyo-Shoami.

Jim


> http://tinyurl.com/mb4s
>

Matt -

The style looks Kyo-Shoami, but I don't know
if they did this type of work in soft metal
rather than iron. Nice looking tsuba in
any account.

Rich S
